live_updates: Technicians will continue working to restore service and we will have an update in the morning. Thank you for your patience.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
29713.summary: Some customers in the Springfield South & Harbour View South areas of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
29713.title: Nov 28 – Winnipeg (Springfield South & Harbour View South) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
